pullRequest.title: [CDAP-16202] Add e2e tests for pipeline actions
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds tests for zoom-in/out, fit-to-screen & Align pipeline actions
Adds a minor data-cy attribute to Feature Heading. This is to avoid tool tips for pipeline action buttons while doing screenshot diffs.

Build: https://builds.cask.co/browse/CDAP-UDUT484
E2E Test: https://builds.cask.co/browse/IT-UPD2100-1

nodes.bodyText: It really helped readability in the previous test to set the selector string to a variable - could do for the other control buttons too.

commit.message:
[CDAP-16202] Add e2e tests for pipeline actions

  - Adds creating simple and complex pipeline as cypress command
  - Refactors pipeline studio spec based on newly added command
  - Removes base image from pipeline studio spec
  - Adds tests for pipeline actions (zoom, fit-to-screen & align)
  - Adds base & actual snapshots for pipeline action test cases
  - Adds data-cy attribute for undo and redo pipeline action buttons
  - Adds data-cy attribute to app header to remove focus from pipeline action buttons

beforeCommit.message: Adds data-cy attribute to app header to remove focus from pipeline action buttons

afterCommit.message:
[CDAP-16202] Add e2e tests for pipeline actions

  - Adds creating simple and complex pipeline as cypress command
  - Refactors pipeline studio spec based on newly added command
  - Removes base image from pipeline studio spec
  - Adds tests for pipeline actions (zoom, fit-to-screen & align)
  - Adds base & actual snapshots for pipeline action test cases
  - Adds data-cy attribute for undo and redo pipeline action buttons
  - Adds data-cy attribute to app header to remove focus from pipeline action buttons
